divs: Sighting DetailsWhen i was younger, i went over to a friends house who lived about a mile away from me. we lived in a forested area at the time, which has been turned into a houseing developement. THere were about 5 of us who saw this UFO late at night. It was very low to the trees. not near the ground but close to the tree tops. it had a large circular shape, with lights that were kind of in a flash. then it dissapeared very quickly. I could try to get a hold of a few of my friends to testify this. IT was a little weird.We were kind of scared, but we waited and stood there for a long time, and it seemed longer but I cannot really remember the exact amount of time it lasted. then we went back to my friends house who lived closer in a hurry.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Sherwood
There were no other sightings in Sherwood on or around March 31st 1994
Summary: Large size, fast, had luminous lights.
